CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has history of severe allergic reactions'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"
Referenced in the following locations:
* Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications
* Tabs: BCG
Hepatitis B vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
Referenced in the following locations:
* Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisBcontraindications
* Tabs: HepatitisB
Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis B if the client had a history of serious allergic reactions to any of the vaccine components. Allergy to yeast is considered a contraindication to immunization with yeast-produced hepatitis B-containing vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis B if the client had a history of serious allergic reactions to any of the vaccine components. code.value: The client has history of severe allergic reactions
Hepatitis B vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.

Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis B if the client had a history of serious allergic reactions to any of the vaccine components. Allergy to yeast is considered a contraindication to immunization with yeast-produced hepatitis B-containing vaccine.
